sentences.english: It need quite a long time return to the former stability after rain, 5.
sentences.chinese: 降雨過後相當長時間，滑坡才能恢復到雨前的穩定性。

sentences.english: Loess landslide is the most catastrophic geohazard in the northwest area of China.
sentences.chinese: 黃土滑坡是西北地區最爲嚴重的地質災害。

sentences.english: Heavier rainfall could also cause soil erosion and landslides.
sentences.chinese: 而強降雨也可能導致泥土的腐蝕和山體滑坡。

sentences.english: The application of K section method in Huanglashi landslide is mainly introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了K剖面法在黃臘石滑坡中的應用情況。

sentences.english: Disequilibrium push method is applied to stability evaluation of landslide under seepage forces.
sentences.chinese: 建立了滲透力作用下滑坡穩定性評價的不平衡推力法。

sentences.english: These results have provided powerful basis for design and reconstruction of retain piles in Badu landslide.
sentences.chinese: 這爲滑坡地帶重新構築抗滑樁設計提供了理論依據。

sentences.english: The Douyapeng landslide is the result of reactivation of Taibai rock collapse and landslide.
sentences.chinese: 豆芽棚滑坡系太白巖崩滑體部分復活的產物。

sentences.english: The landslide occurred in the village caused a stir at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 青寧鄉巖門村滑坡的發生在國內外引起了軒然大波。

sentences.english: Sujiahe, a town in in Xiji County, was completely buriedunder a landslide.
sentences.chinese: 西吉縣蘇家河鎮在一次滑坡中整體被埋。

sentences.english: Flooding or additional slides may occur after a landslide or mudflow.
sentences.chinese: 滑坡或泥石流結束後可能會有洪水或其他的碎屑。

sentences.english: Landslides and avalanches, they report, were among the most common.
sentences.chinese: 山體滑坡和雪崩也是鳥兒們最常見死亡原因。

sentences.english: Death toll in the massive landslide in Gansu province is expected to rise rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 甘肅省大規模滑坡造成的死亡人數預計上升。

sentences.english: The slide occurred on the west side of the town.
The Naqing landside that is middle-sized hillside landslide has developed on the granite area.
sentences.chinese: 那勤滑坡發育在花崗岩區，屬中型山體滑坡。

sentences.english: The Naqing landside that is middle-sized hillside landslide has developed on the granite area.
sentences.chinese: 那勤滑坡發育在花崗岩區，屬中型山體滑坡。

sentences.english: The river-blocking landslide appears near the upper left corner of this image.
sentences.chinese: 導致河流堰塞的滑坡地點顯示在本圖左上角。

definition: to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
talus slide/to crumble (of scree slope)/to collapse/landslide
